mapper.select: SELECT o_questions.name questionsName,o_testpaper_cursor.*,o_subject.* FROM o_testpaper_cursor,o_subject,o_questions where o_testpaper_cursor.subject_id=o_subject.id and o_questions.id = o_subject.questions_id and o_testpaper_cursor.teacher_id = #{id}
SELECT id FROM o_teacher where o_teacher.no = #{username}
SELECT id FROM o_classes where code = #{code}
mapper.update: update o_classes set code_end_time = #{codeTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select o_student.*,o_classes.*,o_student_classes.id stuclazzId from o_classes,o_student_classes,o_student where o_classes.id = o_student_classes.classes_id and o_student_classes.student_id = o_student.id and o_classes.id = #{id}
select COUNT(*) from o_testpaper where name = #{name} and classes_id = #{classesId} and teacher_id = #{teacherId}
select COUNT(*) from o_testpaper where id = #{testpaperId} and NOW() <= close_time
select DISTINCT chapter FROM o_subject WHERE questions_id = #{i};
SELECT * FROM o_testpaper_make WHERE teacher_id=#{id} order by id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO o_testpaper (subject_id, classes_id, teacher_id, start_time, name, score, close_time) VALUES (#{subjectId},#{classesId},#{teacherId},#{startTime},#{name},#{score},#{closeTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE o_testpaper SET close_time=#{closeTime} where id = #{testPaperId}
mapper.select: select num from o_open_test_grade where student_id = #{studentId} and open_test_id = #{id}
